snippet: SLOAN--Howard. The Harmonie Club notes with sorrow the passing of our honored member Howard Sloan. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his entire family. Philip R. Cowen, President The Harmonie Club 1/3
lead_paragraph: SLOAN--Howard. The Harmonie Club notes with sorrow the passing of our honored member Howard Sloan. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his entire family. Philip R. Cowen, President The Harmonie Club 1/3
